description.value:
User can spend a Fate Point to drink from the Chalice as a Full Action. In so doing, they return to Full Wounds and remove all Fatigue. Doesn't restore lost limbs or permenant injuries.

Requirements

Blood Angels Sanguinary Priests Only.

Effect: Famed

Notes: 25 R
description.summary: User can spend a Fate Point to drink from the Chalice as a Full Action. In so doing, they return to Full Wounds and remove all Fatigue. Doesn't restore lost limbs or permenant injuries.
